I just wanted to say Hi and that I am glad I found this group.  My father d=
ied not long ago 
and left two samurai swords which are now in my possessio=
n.  He acquired them in Papua 
New Guinea after the battle of Buna.  One is=
 in a plain brown storage case and the other is in 
a pebbled case with a l=
eather cover.  I hope, over time, to discover all that I can about them.  
=
As my father never talked about his 4 years of fighting in the Pacific thea=
tre, these are the 
only link that my siblings and I have to his time there=
.  We hope that as we learn more about 
these swords, we will also learn ab=
out those times and the valorous men who fought on both 
sides.  I won't ha=
ve expertise to share, but look forward to learning a great deal from all o=
f 
you.  Is it permissible to post photos on this site?

Chris
